name: Lightning Bolt
text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Stroke of Genius
text: Target player draws X cards.
flavor: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

name: Gaea's Cradle
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature you control.
flavor: Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."\n—Gamelon

name: Memory Lapse
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor: Um...oh...what was I saying?"\n—Reveka

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.

name: Vampiric Tutor
text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

name: Ball Lightning
text:
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)\nHaste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.
flavor: Life
multiverseid: Makes awful lightning." - Elizabeth Barrett Browning

name: Oath of Druids
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

name: Hammer of Bogardan
text: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\n{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Tradewind Rider
text: Flying\n{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: 'Tis a shame
multiverseid: to have but one anchor."\n—Laurence Sterne

name: Intuition
text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

name: Argothian Enchantress
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nWhenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

name: Living Death
text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

name: Armageddon
text: Destroy all lands.
flavor: 'O miserable of happy! Is this the end/ Of this new glorious world... ?'"\n—John Milton

name: Balance
text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

name: Time Warp
text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
flavor: Let's do it again!"\n—Squee

name: Phyrexian Negator
text: Trample\nWhenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.
flavor: They exist to cease.

name: Deranged Hermit
text:
Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Deranged Hermit enters the battlefield, put four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Squirrel creatures get +1/+1.

name: Hermit Druid
text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
flavor: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

name: Gemstone Mine
text: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

name: Regrowth
text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Sol Ring
text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

name: Mishra's Factory
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
text: Special
flavor: Land

name: Exalted Angel
text:
Flying\nWhenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: She is a theme of honor and reknown
layout: ...Whose present courage may beat down our foes."\n—William Shakespeare

name: Grim Lavamancer
text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Fools dig for water
multiverseid: or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper.""

name: Meddling Mage
text: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, name a nonland card.\nThe named card can't be cast.
flavor: Meddling mages chant so loudly that no one can get a spell in edgewise.

name: Pernicious Deed
text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
flavor: The tyrannous and bloody deed is done
layout: The most arch deed of piteous massacre That ever yet this land was guilty of."\n—William Shakespeare

name: Ravenous Baloth
text: Sacrifice a Beast: You gain 4 life.
flavor: All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive.\n—Elvish refugee

name: Cunning Wish
text: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.
flavor: The foolish wish for that which they desire. The cunning wish for that which they require.

name: Yawgmoth's Will
text: Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard.\nIf a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

name: Vindicate
text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor: Some convictions are so strong that the world must break to accommodate them.

name: Decree of Justice
text:
Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nCycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Orim's Chant
text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)\nTarget player can't cast spells this turn.
If Orim's Chant was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

name: Mind's Desire
text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Demonic Tutor
text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Goblin Piledriver
text: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.)\nWhenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

name: Living Wish
text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

name: Maze of Ith
text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

name: Stifle
text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Burning Wish
text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

name: Bloodstained Mire
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Flooded Strand
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Polluted Delta
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Windswept Heath
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Wooded Foothills
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Sinkhole
text: Destroy target land.

name: Natural Order
text: As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature.\nSearch your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: ...but the price of Mangaras's freedom was Asmira's life.

name: Phyrexian Dreadnought
text: Trample\nWhen Phyrexian Dreadnought enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

name: Thawing Glaciers
text: Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped.\n{1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

name: Land Tax
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Morphling
text: {U}: Untap Morphling.\n{U}: Morphling gains flying until end of turn.

name: {U}: Morphling gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{1}: Morphling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Morphling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
text: Special
flavor: Creature

name: Wheel of Fortune
text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

name: Wasteland
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor: The land promises nothing and keeps its promise. -Oracle en-Vec

name: Entomb
text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: A grave is the safest place to store ill-gotten treasures.

name: Sword of Fire and Ice
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from blue.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of Fire and Ice deals 2 damage to target creature or player and you draw a card.
Equip {2}

name: Vendilion Clique
text:
Flash\nFlying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

name: Bitterblossom
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and put a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

name: Mana Crypt
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.\n{T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

name: Dark Confidant
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: Greatness, at any cost.

name: Doubling Season
text: If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.\nIf an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

name: Goblin Welder
text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.
flavor: I wrecked your metal guy
layout: boss. But look! I made you an ashtray.""

name: Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed
text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)\nSacrifice Xiahou Dun, the One-Eyed: Return target black card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Flusterstorm
text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Noble Hierarch
text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
flavor: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

name: Karmic Guide
text:
Flying, protection from black\nEcho {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Sneak Attack
text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Karakas
text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

name: Sword of Light and Shadow
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from white and from black.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you gain 3 life and you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Equip {2}

name: Command Tower
text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

name: Bribery
text: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Imperial Recruiter
text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Crucible of Worlds
text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.
flavor: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

name: Overwhelming Forces
text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
flavor: By the year 208, Cao Cao commanded more than 1,000 experienced generals and a million infantry, cavalry, and naval troops.

name: Show and Tell
text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: At the academy, show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide.""

name: Vindicate
text: Destroy target permanent.
flavor: I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me.\n—Sorin Markov

name: Genesis
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more.\n—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Karador, Ghost Chieftain
text: Karador, Ghost Chieftain costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.\nDuring each of your turns, you may cast one creature card from your graveyard.
flavor: Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return

name: Greater Good
text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
flavor: To examine the causes of life
layout: we must first have recourse to death."\n—Mary Shelley

name: Riku of Two Reflections
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.\nWhenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.

name: Force of Will
text: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Force of Will's mana cost.\nCounter target spell.

name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker

name: Sword of Feast and Famine
text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from black and from green.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you untap all lands you control.
Equip {2}

name: Nekusar, the Mindrazer
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.\nWhenever an opponent draws a card, Nekusar, the Mindrazer deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.

name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
text: Vigilance\nOther creatures you control get +2/+2.

name: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.
cmc: The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist
colorIdentity: we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them.""
flavor: Praetor

name: Oloro, Ageless Ascetic
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life.\nWhenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Oloro, Ageless Ascetic is in the command zone, you gain 2 life.
